Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Description: Action movies are packed full of high intensity scenes, designed to excite & awe

Genre.Name: Comedy
Genre.Description: Comedy is a genre of fiction that consists of discourses or works intended to be humorous or amusing by inducing laughter

Genre.Name: Fantasy
Genre.Description: Fantasy is a genre of speculative fiction involving magical elements, typically set in a fictional universe and sometimes inspired by mythology and folklore. Its roots are in oral traditions, which then became fantasy literature and drama
